meanings.definition: A symbol resembling a cross with a loop instead of the top arm, representing life or immortality.
meanings.sent1: The ankh was carved on the ancient stone tablet.
meanings.sent2: She wore a necklace with an ankh pendant.
meanings.sent3: The ankh symbol glowed mysteriously in the moonlight.
meanings.sent4: His laughter was like the ankh, bringing joy and vitality to all around.
meanings.sent5: The ankh, a symbol of eternity, hung above the doorway.

meanings.definition: A looped cross symbol used in ancient Egyptian hieroglyphics.
meanings.sent1: The hieroglyph contained the ankh symbol.
meanings.sent2: Archaeologists discovered an ankh inscribed on the temple wall.
meanings.sent3: The ankh hieroglyph seemed to wink mischievously at the scholars.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as radiant as the ankh, spreading warmth and happiness.
meanings.sent5: The ankh in the text conveyed the concept of eternal life.
